signup-list-1.message: Webmaker ऑनलाइन साधने आपल्या स्वत: च्या सामग्री तयार करण्यासाठी वापरा
signup-list-1.description: Use Webmaker's online tools to create your own content

signup_intro.message: Webmaker is free forever, so you can use the tools, events and teaching resources at no cost, wherever you are, whatever your skill-level. Just sign up for an account to save and publish the things you make.
signup_intro.description: Webmaker is free forever, so you can use the tools, events and teaching resources at no cost, wherever you are, whatever your skill-level. Just sign up for an account to save and publish the things you make.
